pull.title: BIP374: Add message to rand computation
pull.body: Include the message in the rand computation to avoid leaking `a` as described [here](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1689#discussion_r1939790470).

events.body: This might be a good point to introduce a Changelog?

> This might be a good point to introduce a Changelog?

@andrewtoth would you like to add a changelog here? I suppose an editor can add one if you prefer.

comments.diff_hunk: @@ -118,6 +118,12 @@ This proposal is compatible with all older clients. A reference python implementation is included [https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0374/reference.py here]. Test vectors can be generated by running ./bip-0374/gen_test_vectors.py which will produce a CSV file of random test vectors for both generating and verifying proofs. These can be run against the reference implementation with ./bip-0374/run_test_vectors.py. +== Changelog == + +To help implementors understand updates to this BIP, we keep a list of substantial changes. + +* 2025-02: Add the message to the rand computation
comments.body:
Perhaps you could use the [formatting](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0003.md#changelog) proposed by BIP3, even if it’s not active at this time:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4b259455-d0d1-43dd-99dc-788c3266acb2)

The version 1.0.0 is reserved for the move to Proposed, so probably 0.1.0 or 0.2.0, if you want to backfill 0.1.0 would be appropriate.

comments.diff_hunk: @@ -118,6 +118,12 @@ This proposal is compatible with all older clients. A reference python implementation is included [https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0374/reference.py here]. Test vectors can be generated by running ./bip-0374/gen_test_vectors.py which will produce a CSV file of random test vectors for both generating and verifying proofs. These can be run against the reference implementation with ./bip-0374/run_test_vectors.py. +== Changelog == + +To help implementors understand updates to this BIP, we keep a list of substantial changes. + +* 2025-02: Add the message to the rand computation
